channel.title: Where do i add item commands?
channel.description: i am using source phonescape and dont know where to put item commands if anyone could tell me where to exactly put it and give me the code for it i would aprecciate it =)[br][size=1]Posted on: March 20, 2007, 05:15:01 PM[/size][hr]Omg No one knows -.-

item.title: Where do i add item commands?
item.dc:creator: @Metllicadbom Metllicadbom
item.description:
@Metllicadbom wrote:

search for something that looks like this… then look for what you want to add in…

else if (command.startsWith("runes") && playerRights >= 2) { addItem(558,1000); addItem(560,1000); addItem(561,1000); addItem(562,1000); addItem(563,1000); addItem(566,1000); addItem(4278,1000); addItem(554,1000); addItem(555,1000); addItem(556,1000); addItem(565,1000); addItem(557,1000); sendmessage("enjoy") }

Read full topic

item.title: Where do i add item commands?
item.dc:creator: @1_dum_taco 1 dum taco
item.description:
@1_dum_taco wrote:

everyone knows…client.java…

also your not specific on what you want to spawn. it would look something like this-depends on what your spawning and how mcuh of that sonthing else if (command.startsWith("runes") && playerRights >= 2) { addItem(558,1000); addItem(560,1000); addItem(561,1000); addItem(562,1000); addItem(563,1000); addItem(566,1000); addItem(4278,1000); addItem(554,1000); addItem(555,1000); addItem(556,1000); addItem(565,1000); addItem(557,1000); sendmessage("enjoy") }
